body_content.explanation: someone or something that has been hurt, damaged, or killed or has suffered, either because of the actions of someone or something else, or because of illness or chance:
examples: to provide financial aid to hurricane/flood, etc. victims
The children are the innocent/helpless victims of the fighting.
The new drug might help save the lives of cancer victims.
We appear to have been the victims of a cruel practical joke.
Our local hospital has become the latest victim of the cuts in government spending.

body_content.explanation: to be hurt, damaged, or killed because of something or someone:
examples: Sea turtles in this region often fall victim to the effects of pollution.
